abilities.name: Source.
abilities.description: tales from the yawning portal,  page 230

abilities.name: Constructed Nature.
abilities.description: An animated table doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

abilities.name: Antimagic Susceptibility.
abilities.description: The table is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the table must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

abilities.name: False Appearance.
abilities.description: While the table remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal table.

abilities.name: Charge.
abilities.description: If the table moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
